          <title>
            <string language="en">A bicycle and some lubricating oil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Fahrrad und etwas Schmieröl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une bicyclette et de l'huile de graissage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma bicicleta e algum óleo lubrificando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una bicicletta e un certo olio lubrificante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ποδήλατο και κάποιο λαδώνοντας πετρέλαιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una bicicleta y un poco de aceite lubricante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a bicycle and some lubricating oil that is used to protect some of its parts from rusting.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">anti-corrosion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">anti-rust</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rusting</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Fahrrad und etwas 
Schmieröl, das benutzt wird, um einige seiner Teile vor dem Verrosten
zu schützen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une bicyclette et de 
l'huile de graissage qui est employée pour protéger certaines de ses
pièces contre le rouillement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma bicicleta e algum 
óleo lubrificando que é usado proteger algumas de suas peças de 
oxidar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una bicicletta e un 
certo olio lubrificante che è usato per proteggere alcune delle 
relative parti dall'arrugginimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα ποδήλατο και κάποιο 
λαδώνοντας πετρέλαιο που χρησιμοποιείται για να προστατεύσει 
μερικά από τα μέρη του από την οξύδωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una bicicleta y un poco 
de aceite lubricante que se utilice para proteger algunas de sus 
piezas contra aherrumbrar.</string>
          </description>
